name: Zipper
slogan: Ethical alternative to payday loans and overdraft fees in the UK
description: Because of infrequent payroll cycles in the UK, our users are forced to rely on expensive solutions like payday loans or overdraft fees to afford recurring purchases such as groceries or phone bills. This problem is more pronounced for UK consumers than for US consumers because paychecks are even more infrequent than the typical 2 week cycle in the US (a large portion of our users get paid every 4 weeks or the last weekday of every month). We give our users an inexpensive alternative to payday loans or overdraft fees by offering small cash advances up to two weeks before their payday, completely interest and fee free. Instead, they decide if they would like to give us a tip for our services.

team.name: Douglas Kim
team.bioHtml: • Worked at @Bridgewater Associates,

jobs.title: Business Development Associate
jobs.description:
At Zipper, we are changing the way our users access their paycheck by offering an alternative to payday loans. We are a fairly new and small company, so there is plenty of work to do. Currently we are looking for a hard working and ambitious individual to be one of the first hires on our team. 

While we are looking for someone primarily in business development, the youth of our company allows for ownership of other aspects of our business.

Your responsibilities will include (but are not limited to):
-Help develop, execute, and manage customer acquisition strategies
-Contact UK businesses to onboard employees onto our platform in a wholesale fashion
-Build out acquisition/CRM infrastructure
-Help with onboarding customers

Skill requirements:
-Ambitious mentality, with no fear of rejection
-Strong communication skills
-Basic ability to use Google Sheets, and familiarity with G Suite
-(Preferred) Prior sales or marketing experience
-(Preferred) Experience using Adwords or other digital marketing tools
